alert.note: Alert for Washington (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 21 at 2:43AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN WASHINGTON... PERRY...SOUTHEASTERN WAYNE AND GREENE COUNTIES THROUGH 330 AM CST... At 242 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles southwest of Buckatunna to 13 miles northwest of Leakesville to 9 miles east of Brooklyn. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Richton, Leakesville, Beaumont, New Augusta, McLain, State Line, Buckatunna, and Fruitdale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
